description: Generation of Initialization Vector (IV) is done using Random Number Generation. Random number can be predicted which should be avoided. Prediction of Initialization Vector can be used in Cryptographic Attacks like Initialization Vector Prediction attack.
recommendation: Generate Initialization Vector (IV) from SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong() or SecureRandom.getInstance() methods to create a random number suitable for generating secure keys. Note that the security of these methods might not be sufficient for some use cases and should be reviewed thoroughly.
